data.name: V Lights
data.detailed_description:
A sweet horror experience:


V Lights was developed to give players a 2D online horror experience. In the game, you can control a cursed ghost that has been trapped in the house for many years, you can hunt other players using your skills, or you can escape from this cursed house by finding the necessary items in the house with other players like you trying to survive.

How about some hunting?


While playing this cursed ghost, which is very sensitive to light, you can leap forward, pass through walls and hide in the furniture in the house. Are you hungry? Then head towards a player and you'll be dashed forward to smash him! Remember, your eyes are very sensitive to light.

Be quiet!


Remember that your flashlight is your only weapon. This flashlight can even protect you from a cursed ghost. All you have to do is point the light at it and run away without looking back! You should use your flashlight carefully and remember that the battery may run out. Is your battery dead? You can start looking for battery boxes in the house. While there is no battery in your flashlight, you can turn off the energy switches in the rooms and light up a bit. While doing all this, remember to be quick, he might be chasing ghosts...

Game Features:


•Classic Mode
People trying to escape from the house and a creature hunting them!

• Flashlight
By pointing his flashlight at the ghost, you can slow him down and restrict his field of vision.

• Claws
By dashing forward, you can pass through walls, hide inside objects and kill other players.

• Switches
The energy switches in the rooms are responsible for the light energy of that room. When you turn the switch to the on position, the room is illuminated. And when the switch is turned off, you better get away!

• 3D Voice Chat
You can hear the voices of the players according to their position. More realistic communication, more exciting plans...

• Escape From Home
You have to find the items in the house and take them to the outer door in a certain order. These items can open the locked outer door and allow you to escape from the house.

data.short_description: V Lights is a 2D multiplayer horror game with eye-catching graphics. Set strategic traps on your opponent with items, light controls, and dash time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel I7 870
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
